trans-unit.source: Stop a running apphost or the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 apphost 또는 지정된 리소스를 중지합니다.

trans-unit.source: Multiple AppHosts are running. Use {0} to specify which one to stop, or use {1} to stop all of them.
trans-unit.target: Multiple AppHosts are running. Use {0} to specify which one to stop, or use {1} to stop all of them.

trans-unit.source: Multiple AppHosts are running. Use --project to specify which one to stop, or select one:
trans-unit.target: 여러 AppHost가 실행 중입니다. --project를 사용해 중지할 AppHost를 지정하거나 하나를 선택하세요.

trans-unit.source: No running AppHosts found in the current directory. Showing all running AppHosts:
trans-unit.target: 현재 디렉터리에서 실행 중인 AppHost가 없습니다. 실행 중인 모든 AppHost를 표시하는 중입니다.

trans-unit.source: No running AppHosts found in scope.
trans-unit.target: 범위 내에서 실행 중인 AppHost를 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The path to the Aspire AppHost project file.
The {0} and {1} options cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: The {0} and {1} options cannot be used together.

trans-unit.source: The {0} option cannot be used with a resource argument.
trans-unit.target: The {0} option cannot be used with a resource argument.
